abilities.name: peck
abilities.description: A basic attack that deals low damage.

abilities.name: dash
abilities.description: Allows you to gain a burst of speed by pressing SHIFT.

abilities.name: minimap
abilities.description:
Provides you with a minimap that displays your location in the
world at all times.

abilities.name: improvedPeck
abilities.description: Increases the size and damage of your Peck Attack.

abilities.name: wingAttack
abilities.description:
Allows you to perform a wing attack that hits on both sides in a
large area of effect.

abilities.name: improvedWingAttack
abilities.description: Increases the area of effect and damage of your Wing Attack.

abilities.name: fireBreath
abilities.description:
Allows you to shoot a fireball that deals heavy damage but
costs Warmth.

abilities.name: improvedFireBreath
abilities.description: Increases the range and damage of your Flame Breath.

abilities.name: emberNova
abilities.description:
Allows you to conjure a hurricane of fire that stays around you and
deals damage to nearby creatures. Costs Warmth.
